flexportal.title: FlexPortal
flexportal.description: Web portal built using TypeScript and React.js. Features include user and customer management, white-labeling, resource activation tracking, settings, and reporting.

timetable.title: Timetable Management System for public transport
timetable.description: Cloud-based system for importing and managing public transport timetables using VDV 452 and NeTEx standards. Includes routing, detours, announcements, and traffic light control.

angler.title: Angler
angler.description: Android app using computer vision to solve geometry problems via smartphone scanning. Winner of App Start Contest 2016, Croatia's largest student startup competition.

bonfon.title: Bonfon
bonfon.description: Android application for monitoring and assisting child speech and language therapy. Designed primarily for tablets, it helps correct articulation disorders through various exercises. Rector's Award winner.

thesis.title: Distributed Mechanism for Sensor Networks
thesis.description: Master's thesis analyzing different aspects of distributed processing of complex requests in sensor networks. Proposed mechanism inspired by fog computing and auction algorithms.

smarthome.title: Smart Home Apps
smarthome.description: IoT environments developed as part of academic projects. Android apps for smart home device control and real-time sensor monitoring with intuitive data visualization.
